api_list.name: Get a specific food product by GTIN
api_list.description: Returns information about a specific food product identified by its GTIN, including its title, image URL, net weight, category, ingredients, allergens, nutritional information, and manufacturer details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nutrinet-api.p.rapidapi.com/products/8901030653407"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nutrinet-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nutrinet-api.p.rapidapi.com/products/{gtin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nutrinet-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all food products
api_list.description: Returns a list of all food products in the database, including their GTIN, title, image URL, net weight, category, ingredients, allergens, nutritional information, and manufacturer details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nutrinet-api.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nutrinet-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
